appetizers.name: Botanas
appetizers.desc: A sampler of our delicious home-style specialties 4x fajita bean & cheese nacho 4x chicken flautas 4x fajita quesadillas & chile con queso dip. Served with guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

appetizers.name: Pepe’s Shrimp Cocktail
appetizers.desc: Plump, juicy shrimp in a Mexican style cocktail sauce with fresh tomatoes, onions, chopped cilantro & avocado slices. Mild or Hot.

appetizers.name: Quesadillas
appetizers.desc: Three flour tortillas loaded with Monterey Jack cheese, onions, tomatoes, poblano peppers & choice of our delicious fillings. Lightly grilled & served with guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

appetizers.name: Nachos
appetizers.desc: Tortilla chips topped with mixed cheeses, jalapeño peppers & your choice of toppings. Served with guacamole & sour cream.

appetizers.name: Fried Taquitos
appetizers.desc: Three old-fashion style tacos fried then stuffed with lettuce, tomatoes & cheese.

appetizers.name: Guacamole
appetizers.desc: Served over shredded lettuce & topped with diced tomatoes.

appetizers.name: Chile Con Queso
appetizers.desc: Option to add Spinach or Beef Taco Mix.

soups.name: Blackened Chicken Salad
soups.desc: Mixed greens topped with blackened chicken & mango pico dressing.

soups.name: Fajita Salad
soups.desc: Mixed greens loaded with your choice of our delicious fajita meat (Beef, Chicken or Both), cheese, tomato slices, guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

soups.name: Taco Salad
soups.desc: Mixed greens topped with your choice of taco meat, cheese, charra beans, tomatoes, sour cream & crispy tortilla strips.

soups.name: Tortilla Soup
soups.desc: Fresh vegetables in a delicious broth with Mexican rice, seasoned chicken, tortilla strips & Monterey Jack cheese.

soups.name: Albondiga Soup
soups.desc: Omelet-like patties filled with a delicious mix of carrots, potatoes, onions, tomatoes, mild peppers & ground beef in a seasoned broth.

house.name: Sizzling Fajitas
house.desc: Tender beef sirloin or chicken breast, charbroiled & served on a hot skillet over delicious grilled onions. Served with rice, beans, guacamole, sour cream, pico de gallo & flour tortillas.
options: Add sautéed mushrooms, jack cheese & green bell peppers.

house.name: Chipotle Shrimp
house.desc: Six juicy shrimp charbroiled, topped with our chipotle wine sauce. Served with sautéed vegetables, rice & charra beans.

house.name: Vegetable Fajitas
house.desc: A vegetable version of sizzling fajitas with sautéed mushrooms, carrots, chayote squash, potatoes & fresh tomato slices. Served with rice, beans, guacamole, sour cream, pico de gallo & tortillas.

house.name: Rib Eye En Salsa Ranchera
house.desc: (10 oz.) rib eye steak charbroiled & topped with a delicious mild ranchero sauce served with Mexican rice, charra beans, guacamole, pico de gallo & flour tortillas.

house.name: Beef Guiso
house.desc: Tender beef tips sautéed with onions, potatoes & mild peppers, in a delicious authentic Mexican stewed tomato sauce. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans & flour tortillas.

house.name: Pollo Al Chipotle
house.desc: Charbroiled chicken breast topped with our delicious spicy chipotle wine sauce. Served with rice, charra beans, grilled veggies & salad.

house.name: Pescado Veracruz
house.desc: Catfish fillet lightly breaded & fried to a crisp, topped with a celery-based salsa Veracruz & served with rice, charra beans & salad.

house.name: Shrimp Enchiladas
house.desc: Two flour tortillas stuffed with seasoned shrimp & Monterey Jack cheese. Topped with our delicious sour cream sauce & cheese. Served with rice, charra beans & salad.

house.name: Shrimp Fajitas
house.desc: Eight shrimp charbroiled, then served over sautéed vegetables & grilled onions. Topped with our delicious mojo de ajo butter, accompanied with rice, beans, guacamole, pico de gallo & flour tortillas.

house.name: Carne Al Chipotle
house.desc: Tender sirloin steak charbroiled, topped with our delicious spicy chipotle wine sauce. Served with rice, charra beans, grilled veggies & salad.

house.name: Pollo Al Mojo De Ajo
house.desc: (Garlic Lovers Favorite) Charbroiled chicken breast sautéed in a delicious garlic cilantro butter served over a bed of rice with charra beans, guacamole, sour cream & flour tortillas.

house.name: Rib Eye A La Tampiqueña
house.desc: (10 oz.) rib eye steak charbroiled. Served with rice, charra beans, guacamole, pico de gallo & a chipotle cheese enchilada.

mexTex.name: Combination Dinners
mexTex.desc: All combinations are served with rice & refried beans.

mexTex.name: #1 Combo
mexTex.desc: One cheese enchilada & one crispy taco (Beef or Chicken).

mexTex.name: #2 Combo
mexTex.desc: One chicken enchilada & one fajita taco (Beef or Chicken).

mexTex.name: #3 Combo
mexTex.desc: One cheese enchilada, one beef enchilada & one pork tamale.

mexTex.name: #4 Combo
mexTex.desc: One chicken enchilada, one pork tamale & one spinach enchilada.

mexTex.name: #5 Combo
mexTex.desc: One fajita taco (Beef or Chicken,) one cheese enchilada & one pork tamale.

mexTex.name: #6 Combo
mexTex.desc: Two crispy tacos (Beef, Chicken, or Both.)

brunch.name: Migas Con Huevo
brunch.desc: A mixture of eggs, tortilla strips, tomatoes, onions & ranchero sauce. Served with refried beans.

brunch.name: Papas Con Huevo
brunch.desc: Scrambled eggs with potatoes, onions & tomatoes. Served with beans & flour tortillas.

brunch.name: Chilaquiles
brunch.desc: Fried corn tortilla triangles, chorizo, pico de gallo & eggs. Served with beans.

brunch.name: Chorizo Con Huevo
brunch.desc: Scrambled eggs with chorizo, onions & tomatoes. Served with beans & flour tortillas.

brunch.name: Brunch Tacos
brunch.desc: Two flour tortillas filled with scrambled eggs, shredded cheese, onions, tomatoes & your choice of beef fajita, chicken fajita, chorizo or potatoes. Served with refried beans & Mexican potatoes.

brunch.name: Brunch Quesadillas
brunch.desc: Three flour tortillas filled with mixed cheese, onions, tomatoes & scrambled eggs. Served with sour cream & pico de gallo.

brunch.name: Huevos Rancheros
brunch.desc: Three eggs to order topped with ranchero sauce. Served with refried beans & flour tortillas.

tacos.name: Tacos Al Carbon
tacos.desc: Two large flour tortillas stuffed with rib eye strips, sautéed with onions & poblano peppers. Served with rice, beans, guacamole, sour cream & pico de gallo.

tacos.name: Tacos Norteños
tacos.desc: Four mini corn tortilla tacos loaded with fajita steak. Sautéed with pico de gallo & our chipotle wine sauce. Served with rice, beans, chopped cilantro & onions.

tacos.name: Tacos Al Pastor
tacos.desc: Four mini corn tortillas loaded with your choice of pork or chicken sautéed with our pineapple cascabel sauce. Served with rice.

tacos.name: Pork Carnita Tacos
tacos.desc: Three flour tortillas stuffed with braised pork, sautéed with onions & poblano peppers. Served with rice, beans, pico de gallo & our chipotle wine sauce.

tacos.name: Street Style Carnita Tacos
tacos.desc: Four mini corn tortillas topped with braised pork carnita, tomatillo sauce & queso fresco. Served with rice, beans, chopped cilantro & onions.

lunch.name: #1 Enchiladas
lunch.desc: Two enchiladas (Beef, Cheese, Chicken, or Spinach).

lunch.name: #2 Crispy Tacos
lunch.desc: Two crispy tacos (Beef, Chicken, or Both).

lunch.name: #3 Tamales
lunch.desc: Two homemade pork tamales topped with tomatillo sauce.

lunch.name: #4 Fajita Tacos
lunch.desc: Two flour tacos loaded with fajita meat, lettuce, tomatoes & shredded cheese (Beef, Chicken, or Both).

lunch.name: #5 Tostadas
lunch.desc: Two tostadas topped with lettuce, tomatoes, & shredded cheese (Beef, Chicken, or Bean).

lunch.name: #6 Enchiladas En Mole
lunch.desc: Two enchiladas topped with our mole poblano sauce (Chicken or Cheese).

lunch.name: #7 Chipotle Enchiladas
lunch.desc: Two enchiladas topped with our chipotle wine sauce (Chicken or Cheese).

lunch.name: #8 Chicken Enchilada
lunch.desc: One chicken enchilada & one fajita taco (Beef or Chicken).

lunch.name: #9 Cheese Enchilada
lunch.desc: One cheese enchilada & one crispy taco (Beef or Chicken).

lunch.name: #10 Beef & Cheese Enchilada Fajita Taco
lunch.desc: One beef enchilada, one cheese enchilada & one crispy taco (Beef or Chicken).

lunch.name: #11 Spinach Enchilada & Guacamole Soft Taco
lunch.desc: One spinach enchilada & one guacamole soft taco.

lunch.name: #12 Pescado Veracruz
lunch.desc: Farm-raised catfish lightly breaded.Topped with a celery-based salsa. Served with charra beans & rice.

lunch.name: #13 Sizzling Fajitas
lunch.desc: Beef, chicken or both. Served with flour tortillas, pico de gallo, guacamole & sour cream.
options: Make it top shelf - Add mushrooms, jack cheese & green bell peppers

lunch.name: #14 Carne Al Chipotle
lunch.desc: Your choice of chicken or beef topped with our chipotle wine sauce. Served with charra beans, rice & grilled veggies.

lunch.name: #15 Chimichanga
lunch.desc: One chimichanga (Beef or Chicken) topped with your choice of ranchero or queso sauce & served with guacamole & sour cream.

lunch.name: #16 Pork Carnita Tacos
lunch.desc: Two flour tortillas stuffed with braised pork, sautéed with onions & poblano peppers. Served with rice, beans, pico de gallo & our chipotle wine sauce.
